title: What We Do
intro: We create value by transforming challenges into victories for your agency and America, drawing on our team's battlefield and Fortune 50 experience. Tailored solutions accelerate Plan adoption at DoD/VA, delivering secure, efficient outcomes:

cards.title: Consulting
cards.body: Craft IT strategies and cyber roadmaps with NIST frameworks—reducing risks, aligning values, creating resilient defenses via Palo Alto.

cards.title: IT Services
cards.body: Streamline cloud migrations and software with AI automation—enabling seamless operations, scalable growth through AWS/Azure.

cards.title: Project/Program Management
cards.body: Provide Agile leadership with predictive AI—optimizing efficiency, syncing with GSA tools via ServiceNow.

cards.title: AI Implementation
cards.body: Deploy machine learning and automation—ensuring robust, interpretable systems with Palantir/Databricks for mission dominance.

cards.title: Staffing
cards.body: Place AI-skilled veterans—bridging gaps, supporting Plan exchanges for a stronger workforce.

cards.title: Transformation & Simplification
cards.body: Use Design Thinking to redesign operations—blending data insights with human focus, empowering teams for innovative, cost saving alpha.
